summary: This is an email forwarding a status memo regarding Jeffrey Epstein to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG). The email, dated May 13, 2019, includes attachments of the memo and indicates it contains revisions. It originates from the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the status memo being forwarded to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General.

events.title: Status Memo Preparation for ODAG
events.description: A status memo regarding Jeffrey Epstein was prepared for the Office of the Deputy Attorney General.

events.title: Email Forwarding Epstein Memo
events.description: An email was sent forwarding the finalized status memo on Jeffrey Epstein, with revisions, to the Office of the Deputy Attorney General.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY (U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: A status memo regarding Jeffrey Epstein was prepared for the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) as of May 10, 2019.
The finalized memo, with revisions, was forwarded via email on May 13, 2019.
The communication originated from the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document indicates ongoing legal activity and high-level DOJ review of the Epstein case in May 2019.
